stories.text:
Say I want to log every change to the database, how does one go about implementing that when using open source DBs like Postgres or CouchDB? Are there open source, on-premise solutions available for this?

Also, what other factors need to be considered when implementing audit trail?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you implement audit trail for a product?

stories.text:
My Mercury Bank application was just denied due to the country where I’m located (Southeastern Europe).

I opened up an LLC in the US and I’m looking for a solid and reliable bank where I can easily integrate with Stripe / PayPal and do all things online (international wires / payments).

What are my alternatives?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Mercury Bank Alternatives?
